title: Champion types
body:
So I was thinking about what types champions would be, like i dont know pokemon or something
like for example annie would be fire, nami would be water, cho gath would be chaos 
would anyone like to expand on this?

replies.body:
Rock : Malphite, taliyah
ice: Sejuani, ash, anivia, 
humans: J4, Sivir, Garen
blood: Vlad
light: lux
Robot: Blitz
poison: Cass, Teemo
... and then there's Urgot ... ;) pretty cool idea, Would be great to find a place for every champion.
